title: Sweet and tangy chilli beef
description: This delicious beef salad is healthy and quick to prepare - perfect for a midweek supper.
ingredients: ½ small cucumber, halved lengthways, de-seeded and finely chopped
1 tsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
1 large handful baby spinach leaves, washed
2 heads pak choi, green stem variety, washed and sliced
1 small mango, peeled, stone removed, flesh finely diced
